products.title: Samsung WF330ANW
products.description:
The Samsung WF330ANW is a high-end front-loading washer similar to the Samsung WF220ANW. The WF330ANW boasts a number of improvements over the WF220ANW, namely one more wash cycle (totaling 9), steam cleaning, Diamond Drum design and a larger capacity (4.3 cu. ft. as opposed to 4). Otherwise, the two washers sport very similar specs and features including a self-cleaning cycle.

The WF330ANW's steam cleaning technology allows users to add a steam cycle to 7 of the WF330ANW's 9 wash cycles for added cleaning power. Its Diamond Drum design features a diamond studded drum interior which has been specifically designed to reduce wear on clothing. Additionally, the WF330ANW's PureCycle self-cleaning mode utilizes hot water to clean the WF330ANW's drum, lengthening its lifespan as no harsh chemicals are used that might degrade it.

Features

  • 4.3 cu. ft. capacity
  • Steam Clean technology
  • Diamond Drum design
  • Bleach, detergent and fabric softener dispensers
  • PureCycle self-cleaning option
  • 19 Hour Delay Start Timer
  • Vibration Reduction Technology
  • 9 Wash Cycles
  • 3 Wash Cycle Options
  • 1 Year warranty, parts and labour

Colour Options

  • Samsung WF330ANB - Breakwater Blue - $899

pros.text: pleasant sounding chime at the end of the cycle
controls are intuitive and simple to learn
good warning system for when water hoses are crimped and other general maintenance issues
water usage is very conservative
runs almost silently, can hear it a bit when doing the spin cycle but isn't ever very loud
no snags or tangles, everything stays loose

cons.text: panel design is intimidating to look at when first starting out, new users have to be willing to just try it out

related.title: Samsung WF210ANW
related.description:
The Samsung WF210ANW is a high-end front-loading washer with a 4 cu. ft. capacity. It features three dispenser trays for bleach, detergent and fabric softener as well as a 19 Hour Delay Start Timer for added convenience. Additionally, the WF210ANW sports Vibration Reduction Technology which allows it to be installed on the upper floors of a home.

The WF210ANW's dispenser trays allow users to add the detergent, fabric softener and bleach at the beginning of the wash as each element gets introduced to the load at just the right moment. Its 19 Hour Delay Start Timer allows users to set the WF210ANW to start at any point up to 19 hours into the future, allowing loads to be ready as soon as you wake up or get home from work. Meanwhile, the WF210ANW's Vibration Reduction Technology ensures smooth, quiet performance even at 1300 rotations per minute, making installation on upper floors a valid option.

Features

  • 4 cu. ft. capacity
  • Bleach, detergent and fabric softener dispensers
  • 19 Hour Delay Start Timer
  • Vibration Reduction Technology
  • 6 Wash Cycles
  • 3 Wash Cycle Options
  • 1 Year warranty, parts and labour

pros.text: Quiet operation compared to other front-load washers
Highly efficient spin cycle means less required dryer time, resulting in energy savings
Settings and operation are straight-forward and easy to learn
Uses extremely little water compared to other front- or top-load washers
Cleans clothes very effectively without wearing them out as much as some washers
Large door opening adds to ease of use

cons.text: Some loads take slightly longer to clean than in top-load washers

related.title: Samsung WF220ANW
related.description:
The Samsung WF220ANW is a high-end front loading washer similar to the Samsung WF210ANW. The WF220ANW boasts two major improvements over the WF210ANW, namely a self-cleaning cycle and more wash cycles (8 as opposed to the WF210ANW's 6). Otherwise, the two washers sport similar features and specs, including a 4 cu. ft. capacity, a 19 Hour Delay Start Timer and Vibration Reduction Technology.

The WF220ANW's PureCycle self-cleaning option uses only very hot water rather than harsh chemicals to remove dirt and eliminate bacteria, lengthening the life of the drum. Its 19 Hour Delay Start Timer allows users to set the WF220ANW to start at a set point in the near future, allowing laundry to be ready just as you're coming home from work. Additionally, the WF220ANW's Vibration Reduction Technology ensures smooth, quiet performance while in use, allowing the WF220ANW to be placed on the upper floors of a house without worry.

Features

 

  • 4 cu. ft. capacity
  • Bleach, detergent and fabric softener dispensers
  • PureCycle self-cleaning option
  • 19 Hour Delay Start Timer
  • Vibration Reduction Technology
  • 8 Wash Cycles
  • 3 Wash Cycle Options
  • 1 Year warranty, parts and labour

pros.text: runs very quietly, even during the spin cycle you can talk in a normal voice while standing next to it
bright digital clock shows number of minutes left in the cycle, can see it from across the room
water and electricity use are very low, energy efficient
door is wide and easy to work with - lots of room to put things in and pull them out
coins and other objects are collected in an easily accessible area

cons.text: tune played at the end of the cycle isn't very loud, won't hear it unless you're in the same room
need to read the instructions to operate it properly, seems overwhelming at first

related.title: Samsung WF350ANW
related.description:
The Samsung WF350ANW is a high-end front loading washer similar to the Samsung WF330ANW. The sole improvement that the WF350ANW boasts over the WF330ANW is its expanded wash cycles (11 as opposed to the WF330ANW's 9) including a Deep Steam cycle. Otherwise, the two washers sport very similar features, including a Diamond Drum design and a self cleaning cycle.

The WF350ANW's Deep Steam cycle applies high-powered steam to clothing, eliminating the need for pre-treating as fresh stains and dirt are loosened by the pressured steam. Its Diamond Drum design features an inner drum design that is studded with diamond-shaped bumps designed to reduce wear on clothing. Additionally, the WF350ANW's PureCycle self cleaning option is not only convenient, it lengthens the life of the drum as only hot water is used to clean it.

Features

  • 4.3 cu. ft. capacity
  • Steam Clean technology
  • Diamond Drum design
  • Bleach, detergent and fabric softener dispensers
  • PureCycle self-cleaning option
  • Deep Steam cycle
  • Vibration Reduction Technology
  • 11 Wash Cycles
  • 3 Wash Cycle Options
  • 1 Year warranty, parts and labour

Colour Options

  • Samsung WF350ANR - Tango Red - $999

pros.text: runs very quietly, won't usually hear it in the next room
offers plenty of control over how the wash cycle runs
dispensers work reliably, never miss a cycle once you've set them
clothes come out clean and fresh, especially with the steam functions

cons.text: mold can tend to form in the detergent dispenser
mold buildup can accumulate on the outside edge of the drum
will shake at the beginning of the spin cycle until it self-adjusts

related.title: Samsung WF520ABP
related.description:
The Samsung WF520ABP is a top-of-the-line front loading washer similar to the Samsung WF350ANW. The main improvements that the WF520ABP boasts over the WF350ANW are an extended 5 cu. ft. capacity (the WF350ANW's capacity is 4.3 cu. ft.), a Stainless Platinum Exterior, 13 wash cycles (as opposed to the WF350ANW's 11), 6 wash cycle options (as opposed to 3) and PowerFoam technology. Otherwise, the two washers sport the same specs and features, including Steam Clean options and Vibration Reduction Technology.

The WF520ABP's PowerFoam technology utilizes a mix of detergent, water and air at the beginning of each cycle to create a deep-cleansing foam which ensures a better spread when foamed for a greater overall clean. Its Steam Clean ability can be added to 7 of the WF520ABP's 13 wash cycles for a greater clean and quick stain removal. Meanwhile, the WF520ABP's Vibration Reduction Technology ensures quiet, smooth operation even at maximum speeds, allowing it to be used on the upper floors of a home.

Features

  • 5 cu. ft. capacity
  • Stainless Platinum Exterior
  • Steam Clean technology
  • Diamond Drum design
  • PowerFoam technology
  • Bleach, detergent and fabric softener dispensers
  • PureCycle self-cleaning option
  • Vibration Reduction Technology
  • 13 Wash Cycles
  • 6 Wash Cycle Options
  • 1 Year warranty, parts and labour

pros.text: good door design, easy to load and unload
digital display is easy to read, text is sharp and well backlit
doesn't start smelling musty like some other front-loaders
lots of cycle types and options available, easy to find something perfect
Steam Clean cycle effectively eliminates odors
good stability, easy to get it balanced right

cons.text: PowerFoam functionality doesn't actually wash clothes as well in cold as in warm, as claimed
